kata_indonesia: sejenis ikan lélé yang berbintik-bintik warna kuning
kalimat_besemah: Banyaq jeme dindaq makan keli li nginaqe berintiq

kalimat_inggris: Many people do not like to eat yellow-spotted catfish because of its spots

kata_indonesia: nama tanda baca baru berupa satu garis miring ke kanan di bawah Surat Ulu yang menunjukkan bunyi /i/
kata_inggris: the name of a new punctuation in the form of a line tilted to the right below an Ulu Letter signing the sound /i/
